biotools.summary: JAVA framework for accurate Variant assessment (JACUSA2) is a one-stop solution to detect single nucleotide variants (SNVs) and reverse transcriptase induced arrest events in Next-generation sequencing (NGS) data.

bioschemas.name: JACUSA2
